Hikari Leadership

Helping you find clarity to lead with purpose

Leadership Accelerate Technology Design

What We Offer

Our Leadership resoruce helps leaders get unstuck, find clarity and progress to the next level no matter the stage of growth their business is in. Through training, equipping and consulting, leaders at any level are inspired and motivated to maximise their performance and lead with integrity in a rapidly changing and fast paced business environment. Using powerful proprietary & international leadership training tools, potential is unlocked to go beyond bottom line and business survival to impacting communities and society at large.

How We Do This

We have developed proprietary Leadership Training, Strat Living on Purpose Everyday (SLOPE) that unlocks leadership potential through discovery of ones Purpose, Calling and using their Strengths to achieve their Vision through effective Goal setting.

As part of our leadership training, we offer strengths assessment and coaching. This powerful tool involves each individual doing an online assessment that produces a report of the leaders top five strengths. This is followed by a one-on-one strength coaching session by our Gullap Strengths Certified Coach to help you unleash how you uniquely achieve success. This will then be followed by a team training session on how best to work with each other using your strengths.

Hikari Leadership employs a vast array of proprietary, licensed and customized products to help your business thrive. Some of these include:

  • How to master your productivity through Time Box Calendar planning and do away with running life from a to do list
  • How to hire for success, getting the right people on the bus.
  • Miro Online Creative Brainstorming and planning.
  • Assessing your digital status and needs, and creating a powerful Digital Suite for your business, o Strategic engagement and planning etc.
